title: Beyoncé is rallying with Kamala Harris in Houston. Will it make a difference?
description: Celebrity endorsements probably don't make much of a difference, experts told BI, but in a historically tight race there could be caveats.

title: Economic concerns are top of voters' minds, but Kamala Harris is choosing a different path for her closing argument
description: Kamala Harris is betting voters can hear two messages at once, but she is leaning hard into anti-Trump attacks in the final weeks before Election Day.
